channel.title: flight on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in flight on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-01
item.description: Slack launches Huddles, Discord-like audio calls you can hop in and out of (6 minute read) Huddles is a new feature in Slack that allows team members to jump in and out of a persistent call freely at all hours.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-24
item.description: Netflix Reportedly Hiring Executive For Expansion Into Video Games (2 minute read) Netflix is looking to do more with interactive entertainment after the success it found with Bandersnatch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-06
item.description: Facebook takes on Nextdoor with Neighborhoods tool (3 minute read) Facebook is rolling out a new feature called Neighborhoods in four US cities and Canada.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-16
item.description: SpaceX successfully launches second crew to space on first operational mission (4 minute read) SpaceX has successfully launched a second crew into orbit inside its Crew Dragon spacecraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-29
item.description: Apple search engine efforts ‘stepping up’ as Google deal under threat (4 minute read) Apple has been working on its Applebot crawler since before 2015, and with Google under investigation for antitrust practices, it may have to put it to use.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-28
item.description: Google will keep employees working remotely until July 2021 (1 minute read) Google will keep its 200,000 full-time and contract employees working remotely until at least July 2021.
